'''Mondstadt''' is a Card Box in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Description==
{{Description|The ceaseless whisper of the breeze plays upon the strings, creating a lovely music.<br />The passionate talk of the wind and flowers is blown away, falling into the heart of the clear spring.|Deck Design Settings Menu}}

==Battle Themes==
Battle Themes during matches are dependent on the Card Box being used. When using '''Mondstadt''' the following themes are played:
* [[Photon of Fluctuation]]
* [[His Resolution]]
